definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Adam was to beautify it and protect it.
sentences.chinese: 亞當的工作是要讓它變得榮美，並加以保護。

sentences.english: I agree that we come to God more when we were in difficulties or hardship.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們來看神創造的榮美。

sentences.english: May the favor of the Lord our God rest upon us;
sentences.chinese: 願主我們神的榮美，歸於我們身上。

sentences.english: Till the beauty of Jesus be seen in me.
sentences.chinese: 直到耶穌的榮美在我彰顯。

sentences.english: May the favor(the beauty) of the Lord our God rest upon us;
sentences.chinese: 願主我們神的榮美歸於我們身上。

sentences.english: Lord, I know only your beauty and saw only goodness from you.
sentences.chinese: 主啊，從你我只知道榮美，只看見仁慈。

sentences.english: Thine eyes shall see the king in his beauty: they shall behold the land that is very far off.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼必見王的榮美，必見遼闊之地。

definition: trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
displaying fully/developing to the greatest extent
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
King Zhou of Shang (11th century BC), notorious as a cruel tyrant
to exhort (sb) to live a virtuous life (Buddhism)/to beg for alms
